author: brane
msg: Fix some fallout from the addition of the '--cleanup' option:
-- log-test-3 was using the repo from log-test-2. That's bad because
a) the test didn't do what it promised, and
b) the --cleanup option removed the previous test's repo, causing
creating the repository for this test.
* svntest/main.py (sbox.__init__): Make self.test_paths a list, not a tuple,
because add_test_path does an append and that doesn't work on tuples.

author: brane
msg: Implement a new '--cleanup' option for the Python tests which causes
the test framework to delete any test-data paths created for/by that
test, but only if the test returned success.  Why?  Because when
testing on tmpfs, it's a pain to have to keep another shell open and
remove the test data of tests that have completed just so my box
doesn't run out of memory (since disk-space == RAM on tmpfs).
- Make each test that generates paths other than the basic wc dir
and repos dir call sbox.add_test_path(path), to register that path
- Decide if this behavior should be the default when 'make check'ing
- Implement a counterpart for the C test framework (maybe).
(Sandbox.__init__): Automatically add wc_dir and repo_dir to the
(run_one_test): Do cleanup after successful test runs in cleanup_mode.
(safe_rmtree): Renamed from remove_wc, docstring and all callers changed.
(TestHarness.run): Pass 'verbose' and 'cleanup' flags to Python tests.
(main): Use getopt for option parsing, add options --verbose and --cleanup
and fix docstring to reflect that.
* win-tests.py: Understand option -c or --cleanup and pass same to the
TestHarness constructor. Always create TestHarness with verbose on.
trans_tests.py, update_test.py, svntest/actions.py: All uses of remove_wc

author: mass
msg: Some cleanup, and new improved/implemented prompting providers for the
* include/svn_ra_dav.h : move to svn_client.h, removing file.
commented that auth providers should not be reliant on one-another.
(server_ssl_callback) : remove masked failures; sussman commented that
auth providers should not be reliant on one-another.
(client_ssl_callback) : use neon methods to load client certificate,
where not all the parameters are specified.
(struct cred_ssl_provider_baton) : structure to hold prompt function / baton

author: gstein
msg: Refactor the template generation and simplify some gen_win code.
(unique): removed. we use dictionaries to do this.
(WinGeneratorBase.get_win_depends): use a dict to eliminate dups
(WinGeneratorBase.get_win_sources): use a dict rather than than a
